author: Intel Corporation
description: Provides an empty packet on a timely manner

in_ports.description: Resets the timer without triggering a packet in the current iteration.
in_ports.name: RESET

in_ports.description: Set the timer's tick interval in milliseconds.
in_ports.name: INTERVAL

in_ports.description: Enables or disables the timer, based on the value of the packet received. When stopped, the timer will cease to emit packets from the OUT port. When enabled again, it does not resume from the point where it was stopped.
in_ports.name: ENABLED

name: timer

members.description: Tick interval the timer will start with, in milliseconds.
members.name: interval

out_ports.description: an empty packet when timer ticks.
out_ports.name: OUT
